/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of red and white, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky dotted with white clouds.

The street itself is a hive of activity. People are seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, while cars are parked neatly along the side of the road. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urban charm to the scene.

In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage contrasting with the red and white of the buildings and adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the city's vibrant energy and architectural beauty.
